content: New guests will be added here once you invite them to the room.

comment.text: This translation key describes a message that appears on an empty screen when there are no invited guests to display. It is used in the "Contacts" section of the Home page and is displayed as a default message when no guests have been added yet.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The verb tense 'budou přidáni' (future passive) sounds slightly awkward in this context. A more natural phrasing would use a simpler present tense or a slightly different construction to imply future addition.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Noví hosté se sem přidají, jakmile je pozvete do místnosti.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'jakmile je pozvete' can be perceived as a bit formal. A more conversational and natural phrasing could improve the overall feel.

The translation 'Նոր հյուրեր կավելացվեն այստեղ, երբ նրանց սենյակ հրավիրեք:' is not a direct and accurate translation of 'New guests will be added here once you invite them to the room.' The phrasing 'երբ նրանց սենյակ հրավիրեք' (when you invite them to the room) is awkward.  It should more accurately convey 'when you invite them'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Նոր հյուրեր կավելացվեն այստեղ, երբ դուք նրանց հրավիրեք:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '新しいゲストは、あなたがルームに招待すると、ここに追加されます。' is a literal translation and sounds unnatural in Japanese. A more natural phrasing would emphasize the automatic addition upon invitation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 新しいゲストは、ルームに招待すると自動的にここに追加されます。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, using 'ルーム' for 'room' is slightly less common in this context. '部屋' would be more natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 新しいゲストは、あなたが部屋に招待すると自動的にここに追加されます。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation is a bit literal and doesn't flow naturally. 'ຄະນະສະມາຊິກ' (khana samachik) usually refers to a committee or group of members, not just guests. The English implies 'new guests'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຄະນະຜູ້ເຂົ້າແຂກ​ໃໝ່ຈະຖືກເພີ່ມຢູ່ທີ່ນີ້ເມື່ອທ່ານເຊີນພວກເຂົາເຂົ້າຫ້ອງ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the sentence structure 'ຄະນະສະມາຊິກຜູ້ມາໃໝ່ຈະຖືກເພີ່ມ' can be improved for a more natural flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຜູ້ເຂົ້າແຂກ​ໃໝ່ຈະຖືກເພີ່ມຢູ່ທີ່ນີ້ເມື່ອທ່ານເຊີນພວກເຂົາເຂົ້າຫ້ອງ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Latvian translation includes a sentence 'Varat nosūtīt savus viesus un pievienot sarakstam viesus, kurus uzaicinājušas citas personas' which is not directly related to the English content. The English says new guests will be added once invited, it doesn't imply adding guests invited by others.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Jauni viesi tiks pievienoti šeit, kad viņus aicināsiet pievienoties telpai.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Novos hóspedes serão adicionados aqui assim que você convidá-los para o quarto' is a literal translation that can be improved for naturalness in Portuguese. A more idiomatic translation would be something like 'Novos convidados aparecerão aqui após você convidá-los para a sala.' or 'Os convidados adicionados aparecerão aqui quando você os convidar para a sala.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Novos convidados aparecerão aqui após você convidá-los para a sala.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Noii invitați vor fi adăugați aici de îndată ce le invitați la sală' is a bit literal and awkward. The phrase 'le invitați la sală' isn't the most natural way to say 'invite them to the room'. It sounds like you're inviting them *to* the invitation itself.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Noii invitați vor fi adăugați aici după ce îi invitați în sală.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'de îndată ce' is grammatically correct, 'după ce' flows better in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'după ce' instead of 'de îndată ce' for a more natural feel.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'නව ආගන්තුකයින් මෙහි එක්රැස් කරනු ලැබේ, ඔබ ඔවුන්ට පහසුරම් දුන් පසු' is not a direct or natural translation of 'New guests will be added here once you invite them to the room.' The phrase 'ඔබ ඔවුන්ට පහසුරම් දුන් පසු' translates to 'after you pay them' which doesn't align with 'invite them'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: නව ආගන්තුකයින් ඔබ ඔවුන්ට ආරාධනා කරන විට මෙහි එක්රැස් කරනු ලැබේ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation 'Нови гости ће бити додати овде када их позовете у собу.' is a literal translation but sounds slightly unnatural in Serbian. A more natural phrasing would be 'Нови гости ће бити додати овде након што их позовете у собу.' or 'Нови гости ће бити додати овде када их користите за приступање соби.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Нови гости ће бити додати овде након што их позовете у собу.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation contains a typo. 'pozovete' should be 'pozovete'.
